column2: an A.M. Eatery////HIPSTERS galore! This place was made for you in mind. Organic
column4: and a full bar to satisfy your every need and mood. Their pancakes are nothing to scream about
column5: but I do like their selection of eggs
column6: and their quinoa bowl is on point. They change their menus seasonly so beware
column7: your favorite item may not make the cut.
